amendment.description: Amendment designates $30 million for the Spinal Cord Injury Research Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to redirect $30 million in the Defense Health Program, Research, Development, Test and Evaluation account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Langevin amendment Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A027) offered by Mr. Langevin.
